about_the_game:
Overview
Embark on a relaxing journey in an underwater realm. Glide through captivating environments, embracing the tranquility of exploration and survival found in these Harmonic Depths. Play in Survival Mode, managing your health, which gradually decreases over time, and replenishing it by feasting on the abundant fish that surround you, or immerse yourself in Casual Mode, exploring the ocean at your own leisure.



Controls
To move up, press the W key, or use the up arrow key. To move down, use the S key, or the down arrow key. For left turns, press A or the left arrow key, and for right turns, use D or the right arrow key. Hold down Left Click to boost. You can pause the game anytime by pressing the Escape Key. Press the Enter Key to return to the main menu.
